article_title: Limited war authority would tie hands of Obama’s successors
article_text: You are the owner of this article.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , war powers, military force, islamic state, congress
article_metadata.author: CHARLES GREENAWALT | Special to LNP

og.description: The new, unnecessary authorization the president requested limits use of military force to three years and does not permit use of American forces in enduring, offensive, ground combat operations.
og.title: Limited war authority would tie hands of Obama’s successors
